alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the dialkyl ether functional group, with the formula ROR', where R and R' are aryl groups.
alternative_parents.name: Diarylethers

alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more benzene rings.
alternative_parents.name: Benzenoids

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the acyl chloride functional group.
alternative_parents.name: Aryl chlorides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an heterocycle with at least one oxygen atom linked to a ring carbon.
alternative_parents.name: Oxacyclic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a chlorine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organochlorides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Organic compounds containing a benzene ring fused to a dioxin ring. Dioxin a six-membered unsaturated ring of two oxygen atoms and four carbon atoms.
class.name: Benzodioxins

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as chlorinated dibenzo-p-dioxins. These are organic compounds containing a chlorine atom attached to a dibenzo-p-dioxin moiety.

direct_parent.description: Organic compounds containing a chlorine atom attached to a dibenzo-p-dioxin moiety.
direct_parent.name: Chlorinated dibenzo-p-dioxins

intermediate_nodes.description: Compounds containing a dibenzo-p-dioxin moiety, which consists of two benzene connected by a para-dioxin ring.
intermediate_nodes.name: Dibenzo-p-dioxins

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Organic compounds containing a benzene ring fused to a 1,4-dioxin ring.
subclass.name: Benzo-p-dioxins

superclass.description: Compounds containing a ring with least one carbon atom and one non-carbon atom.
superclass.name: Organoheterocyclic compounds
